153131211.content: Inna was a girl that went to Kristen's school, so infecting her would not be very difficult. She didn't know exactly how the virus transmitted, but she assumed it could be from microbes on her footwear, so she decided to infect her by switching out their footwear. She needed to wait until a day where Inna was wearing flip flops, where her feet would be in direct contact with the shoe. She knew what flip flops Inna wore, and that night, Kristen found a pair of shoes of her own that looked the exact same. She walked into school the next day with her usual red nail polish on her toes, wearing flip flops. During gym, she was in luck, because she noticed that Inna was wearing her flip flops with her pink toe nail polish and size 10 feet. Thankfully, they were both roughly the same size, at least they were before Kristen's feet started growing. Inna put on her socks and shoes for gym class, and went over to the bathroom before putting her flip flops back in her locker. Without anyone noticing, Kristen switched out the flip flops. After gym, Inna put on Kristen's flip flops, and Kristen noticed almost immediate signs of the growing process. Inna's toenails began to grow longer, and her nail polish started to crack. Kristen knew this would be fun to watch. They sat in the same class the last period of the day, and Kristen stared at Inna's feet throughout class. She noticed her struggling to sit straight as her toes stretched out longer, touching the floor. Her feet began to get wider, and they started to feel constricted in her flip flops. Her soles began to pulsate, begging for more room for her feet to expand. Finally, her feet broke the line strap, and began to grow even bigger. Kristen wasn't paying attention as her feet started growing even bigger as well. Kristen looked down as her own line strap on her new size 16 flip flops broke, and her feet started to grow past a size 20. They both left the classroom and headed down to the nurse. Kristen started laughing as Inna struggled to walk with her now giant feet. Inna turned around. "What are you laughing at?" She looked down at Kristen's feet and gasped. "Oh my god. You have it too?" "Yup," Kristen said. "And I gave it to you!" "Inna screamed. "Why did you do this to me?!" "I felt like it," said Kristen. I didn't want to be alone. "Oh my god, will my feet every go back to normal size?!!" "I have no idea," said Kristen. "So far there's no cure. Our feet may be stuck these sizes and bigger forever." They arrived at the nurses office. The nurse looked at their feet immediately and dialed 911. She noticed something else, however. She was wearing open toe sandals today, which was not a good idea, because the virus now passed from feet to feet through the air. The nurse, Kristen, and Inna all looked down at the nurses black painted, size 11 feet. The nurse screamed as suddenly her toenails started to grow longer, and the nail polish chipped. Her toes expanded and the straps of her sandals broke. Her feet widened and her sandals in its entirety broke completely. She was stuck there, standing with size 14 feet, slowly growing, barefoot in the nurses office. "What the hell is happening?" She said, as she felt her feet continuing to expand on the floor.
